text: A client has used <https://www.mathjax.org/> it doesn’t give you a nice editor though more requires writing the equations in a specific format I think ‘TEX’ and then it converts them in the page to equation format

Ah I realise the tool your looking at is basically a generator that uses laTeX which I think is similar but yeah unfortunately you can’t change the rich text editor in HubSpot, the only way to do it would be through a browser extension
Thx Matt, yes, i know about mathjax it would be gold if we could use a plug in to optimize the Rte use
